job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pAs part of the Wild Health Clarity Engineering team you will be actively involved in building both frontend or backend application features  As part of a team with diverse skill sets you will have an opportunity to provide your own unique value while also learning from the senior and architectural mentors on the teambr pbrpA candidate will be expected to deliver quality software within spec within a timely manner defined within each sprint nbsp pbrpEach member of the team should possess a willingness to contribute to an overall team goal by not only producing software for their individual tasks but also assisting teammates in order to move the entire product forward pbrpnbsp pbrpWhat You Will Enjoy about this Role pullipDelivering the engineering aspect of a professional software development process that starts from stakeholders and product owners plilipCollaborate with different teams to build software that not only operates for a specific vision but also fits within a more holistic purpose plilipWork closely with product management when new features are being considered by being an advocate for not impacting the performance or quality of the existing product plilipParticipate in technical discussions and communicate your ideas or vision to others Be challenged by discussing sophisticated problems open to debates and brainstormings plilipCollaborate with the engineering team to estimate and prioritize tasks pliulpnbsp ppWhat You Bring To The Role pullipInterest in building scaling and operating sophisticated infrastructures plilipInterest in designing wellthought schemas building efficient clientservice layers and properly using various data structures plilipProficiency in C Net Core Python RxJSReact or Nodejs plilipAn ability to adapt to changing situations where new languages technologies or other features will be introduced pliulpnbsp ppNice To Have pullipExperience with building RESTful APIs or GraphQL is a plus plilipExperience with agile development processes working in a fastpaced environment with scheduled release planning plilipExperience working with advanced Business Analytics tools like Looker Tableau or DOMO plilipExperience scaling efficient relational database configurations and writing efficient SQL views stored procedures and functionspliul
